ns0:entry.ns0:title: Alexofp/BDCC
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Alexofp/BDCC
Language: gdscript
Text based game about being a prisoner in a space prison with a lot of adult themes. Working title is Broken Dreams Correctional Center or BDCC for short. Test the latest version here: (could be unstable)

ns0:entry.ns0:title: GDQuest/learn-gdscript
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/GDQuest/learn-gdscript
Language: gdscript
Learn Godot's GDScript programming language from zero, right in your browser, for free.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: HungryProton/scatter
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/HungryProton/scatter
Language: gdscript
Godot engine addon to randomly fill an area with props or other scenes

ns0:entry.ns0:title: Maaack/Godot-Game-Template
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Maaack/Godot-Game-Template
Language: gdscript
Godot template with a main menu, options menus, pause menu, credits, scene loader, extra tools, and an example game scene.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: Maran23/script-ide
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Maran23/script-ide
Language: gdscript
Script-IDE is a plugin for Godot. It transforms the Script UI into an IDE like UI. Tabs are used for navigating between scripts. The default Outline got an overhaul and now shows all members of the script (not just methods) with unique icons for faster navigation.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: MewPurPur/GodSVG
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/MewPurPur/GodSVG
Language: gdscript
A vector graphics application for structured SVG editing, available on all major desktop platforms and on web. Currently in late alpha.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: MikeSchulze/gdUnit4
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/MikeSchulze/gdUnit4
Language: gdscript
Embedded unit testing framework for Godot 4 supporting GDScript and C#. Features test-driven development, embedded test inspector, extensive assertions, mocking, scene testing.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: MudkipWorld/PNGTuber-Remix
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/MudkipWorld/PNGTuber-Remix
Language: gdscript
An Open-source PNGTubing app based off PNGTuber+ :D

ns0:entry.ns0:title: Orama-Interactive/Pixelorama
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Orama-Interactive/Pixelorama
Language: gdscript
Unleash your creativity with Pixelorama, a powerful and accessible open-source pixel art multitool. Whether you want to create sprites, tiles, animations, or just express yourself in the language of pixel art, this software will realize your pixel-perfect dreams with a vast toolbox of features. Available on Windows, Linux, macOS and the Web!

ns0:entry.ns0:title: Quaint-Studios/Reia
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/Quaint-Studios/Reia
Language: gdscript
RPG game action-adventure MMO built with Godot and Rust.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: RodZill4/material-maker
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/RodZill4/material-maker
Language: gdscript
A procedural textures authoring and 3D model painting tool based on the Godot game engine

ns0:entry.ns0:title: TheDuckCow/godot-road-generator
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/TheDuckCow/godot-road-generator
Language: gdscript
A godot plugin for creating 3D highways and streets.
